original_text: Solomon had 12 officers with authority in the regions of Israel. They supplied food for the king and for the people who lived in his palace. Each officer had to supply food to the king for one month in each year.
korean_text: 솔로몬이 또 온 이스라엘에 열두 지방 관장을 두매 그 사람들이 왕과 왕실을 위하여 양식을 공급하되 각기 일 년에 한 달씩 양식을 공급하였으니

sentences.original_text: with authority in the regions of Israel
They supplied food for the king
and for the people who lived in his palace
Each officer had to supply food to the king
sentences.korean_translation: 각 관리는 왕에게 음식을 공급해야 했습니다

sentences.original_text: for one month in each year
